description_for_model: This plugin is used to insert, update, or delete documents in the vector database. Each document includes 'text' and 'metadata'. The 'metadata' includes 'title', 'type', 'source', and 'status'. Note that the documents are stored as document chunks in the database, and the "id" refers to the chunk, whereas the "document_id" is shared by all chunks of the document.  If updating or deleting an existing document, specify the "document_id". The plugin also supports adding and deleting references between documents, with each reference indicating a specific type of relationship.
description_for_human: Vector Graph Memory with Document Relationships
